Directions for daily holy living, by D. Burgess minister of the gospel. Burgess, Daniel, 1645-1713.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed for Tho. Parkhurst at the Bible and Three Crowns in Cheapside, near Mercers Chapel, London : 1690.
Caption title. Imprint from colophon. Printed in three columns. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
